name: Briolette Cabinet - Natural Indigo
description: Our expansive Briolette Cabinet is a kitchen or pantry hero offering plentiful space for essential cooking ingredients. Each of the four decorative cupboard doors, which sport a diamond design reminiscent of French antiques, open to reveal contrasting paintwork and multiple purpose-built storage solutions; from wine racks and removable shelves to integrated spice racks. Made from recycled pine, each cabinet is truly unique with individual characteristics that add to its story.
